title: One UI 5.1.1 and One UI 5 Watch rolling out to even more Galaxy devices
description: The update is rolling out starting tomorrow.

title: What is a DisplayPort?
description: If your computer is new enough, you may be able to get DisplayPort via USB or Thunderbolt.

title: Google’s AI will now summarize lengthy articles into key points
description: Two of Google's SGE updates are rolling out today, with one coming soon.

title: For first time ever, broadcast and cable TV viewing is under 50% in the US
description: Streaming beating cable is no surprise, but that doesn't make this milestone any less significant.

title: Xiaomi Mix Fold 3 hands-on impressions: All that in a skin-tight suit
description: Xiaomi shows Samsung how to trim down and shape up.

title: Google Photos uses AI to make cute memory scrapbooks for you
description: Memories view is rolling out to the US today and globally in the coming months.

title: Samsung Galaxy A55 5G: Release date, specs, price, and all the rumors so far
description: Will we finally see wireless charging this year? What about another redesign?

title: AI-generated stickers are coming to WhatsApp soon
description: WhatsApp is the latest app to test ways to make use of generative AI to allow users more creativity in their expression.

title: You can turn any Android or Windows device into a Chromecast with this app
description: CastReceiver app lets any Android or Windows device become a Google Cast target, letting you cast content to this device.

title: Google could borrow Samsung’s ideas for the Android taskbar
description: Samsung and other brands offer some of these features already, but we're still glad to see them come to stock Android.

title: Specs and images of Samsung’s XR headset prototype have leaked
description: The XR headset from Samsung would compete against the likes of the Apple Vision Pro, but could be much more affordable.

title: Xiaomi Smart Band 8 Pro launched: Blurring the line between tracker and watch
description: A larger screen and bigger battery are two key enhancements here.

title: The Galaxy S24 Ultra’s new 3x camera could address a key Ultra weakness
description: Zoom between 5x and 7x lags behind the best competition, but Samsung finally has an answer.

title: The best Samsung Galaxy Watch 6 bands
description: Give Samsung's newest watch an even fresher look.
